name: Yelistli
description:
This game was made in 48 hours during the 2023 Global Game Jam.
We will most likely not update it or change it any further.

Yelistli is a cozy exploration game with puzzle and strategic elements set in a middle american themed environment. The player explores the map by claiming tiles of green and lifting the fog by it, trying to find all of the lost temples.

Controls:
[WASD] Move Camera
[Left Mouse] Click on UI or Game Element
[Esc] Pause Menu

If you loose or win the game you need to exit and manually start the .exe again because we dont have a replay-button yet.

Current Bugs:
- sometimes the fog doesnt lift on singular tiles sourrounding a tile you clicked on
- there are performance issues while activating tiles
